Landfill update: it‚Äôs emerged that in May 2020, hydrogen sulphide levels on site were measured at 4610ppm! 20ppm can cause eye irritation; 1000ppm can cause death.

@EnvAgencyMids you let this happen. Why is the site still taking waste today? https://t.co/G4L1hSmuNb

@AaronBell4NUL @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @HouseofCommons Still stinking in the town centre last night, years on and it's as bad as ever.
Never mind just an independent investigation no company should have profited from this community blight..keep pushing this.
